meanings.definition: A type of molecule found in the cell walls of fungi and yeast.
meanings.sent1: The zymosans in the cell walls help fungi and yeast stay strong.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the zymosans to learn more about fungi and yeast.
meanings.sent3: The zymosans in the cell walls threw a party for the other molecules.
meanings.sent4: The zymosans stood tall like guardians protecting the fungi and yeast.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the zymosans looked like tiny building blocks holding everything together.

meanings.definition: A substance that stimulates the immune system.
meanings.sent1: Doctors use zymosans to boost the immune system of patients.
meanings.sent2: Athletes sometimes take zymosans to stay healthy and strong.
meanings.sent3: The zymosans in the immune system danced a jig when they detected a threat.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like zymosans, awakening a dormant courage within him.
meanings.sent5: The zymosans worked tirelessly, rallying the immune system to fight off the infection.
